Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™M TBIL Flex reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista TBIL Flex reagent cartridge and TDBIL Calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of bilirubin in serum and plasma
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for quantitative measurement of total bilirubin in human serum and plasma, and calibrator for Direct and Total Bilirubin methods on the Dimension Vista System, used in diagnosis and treatment of liver, hemolytic hematological and metabolic disorders including hepatitis and gall bladder disease
